org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class Legend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.EventProvider<ExtendedOptions>
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Legend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventHandler, AddHandlerEventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler

    public class Legend
extends EventProvider<ExtendedOptions>
    The chart legend displays data about the datasets that area appearing on the chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
